content:
Is it possible to have a @here syntax that mentions everyone who participated in that topic?
Although I should mention that @here in discord notifies every member of the server's channel who is currently online on the server at the time.
Could be worth cleaning these up into issues we can mark as "help wanted".
@Purushottam Tiwari yeah, I think that's very much possible and something we want! If you're interested in working on an @topic, I can do an issue writeup; I think it'd be a very doable feature.
@akshatdalton would you be interested in picking up #16964 again?
Filed #20497 for the @-topic idea, and closed the old hodge-podge issue (#3750).

Tim Abbott said:

Purushottam Tiwari yeah, I think that's very much possible and something we want! If you're interested in working on an @topic, I can do an issue writeup; I think it'd be a very doable feature.

Yeah I would be glad to work on it.
Ohh It appears #20497 is already claimed (probably some new contributor), I'll wait for 5-6 days to see if she makes some progress, and may later take it up based on her progress.
@Purushottam Tiwari I think you should claim it; this is not a good issue for a first contribution.
Posted a comment on the issue thread letting the contributor know.
Sure, thanks for assigning :smile:.
